ul.li: If the door to Room 360 or 380 is locked, go to the main office in Shanks on the third floor and ask for assistance.

If the appliance is not working, call the 1-800 phone number located on the
website.
Hard ingredients (i.e. nuts, chips, chunks) should be added 5 minutes before the end of the spinning cycle.
Dairy substitutes can be found in recipes on .
Users with food allergies should clean all parts thoroughly before use.
